data.name: Shuffled Nightmares Demo
data.detailed_description:
This is a Demo version, which contains 3 of the 12 levels. Random mode is also disabled.

The aim of this puzzle is to use the "Control Points" to rotate parts of each nightmare, so that it shows the complete image.
Each level is more difficult than the previous one. The Control Points start appearing closer to each other, and their behavior changes, to pose a bigger challenge.
data.about_the_game:
This is a Demo version, which contains 3 of the 12 levels. Random mode is also disabled.

The aim of this puzzle is to use the "Control Points" to rotate parts of each nightmare, so that it shows the complete image.
Each level is more difficult than the previous one. The Control Points start appearing closer to each other, and their behavior changes, to pose a bigger challenge.
data.short_description: A puzzle game where you have to rotate parts of an image in such a way to uncover a nightmare. This demo has 3 of the 12 levels, and random mode is disabled.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD a4-9125 RADEON R3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeom(TM) R3 Graphics
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: AMD High Definition Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04.4 LTS
  • Processor: AMD a4-9125 RADEON R3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeom(TM) R3 Graphics
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: AMD High Definition Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: Also tested on Arch Linux
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: After completing each level, the final image shows a nightmare scenario, that might include mature content, such as psychological violence.
